title: Which is better for 4k video editing, RX580 8GB or 5500 XT? - Quora

response.answer_text: 4k video editing or video editing in general is a CPU intensive task and won't make use of the GPU in most cases. So getting the best CPU with multi core performance out there would be the best upgrade. Apart from this, the GPU can also provide some performance boost in the form of GPU accelerated tasks. Among the two mentioned, both cards perform similarly in games and hence are more likely to perform similarly for GPU acceleration too. Hope this helps!

Those are both gaming cards. I’m sure they will do a decent job at editing video but they are not optimized for that purpose. The Radeon Pro series is optimized for rendering video, but these cards are not good for playing games.
